label: ABC2D2_tP6_123_b_a_e_h-001
title: CeCr$_{2}$Si$_{2}$C Structure
comments:
(Pohlkamp, 2001) refer to this as a \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_tI10_139_d_e_a-003}{``filled ThCr$_{2}$Si$_{2}$ structure.''}  
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BCD2_tP6_123_h_a_b_e-001}{BaTi$_{2}$As$_{2}$O} and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2D2_tP6_123_b_a_e_h-001}{CeCr$_{2}$Si$_{2}$C} are both in space group $P4/mmm$ \#123, and use the same Wyckoff positions.  They differ in the c/a ratio.  We follow the ICSD and put them into separate prototypes.
